text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Sunday as reported by the official Algerian news agency APS. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- President Zeroual briefs women's organisations about results of his talks with opposition parties ahead of national conference.
- National conference convenes on Saturday and Sunday.
- Soccer team Mouloudia of Oran beat Vita Club of Zaire 2-0.
- Majority of political parties take part in national conference.
- Spain's Foreign Minister Matutes to visit Algiers on Monday. Trade between Algeria and Spain reached $2 billion in 1995.
